title: "Sentiment analysis of Tweets on ChatGPT"
author: "Stefano Coretta"

![](https://storage.googleapis.com/kaggle-datasets-images/new-version-temp-images/default-backgrounds-96.png-7511536/dataset-cover.png)

[Kaggle](https://www.kaggle.com) is a great resource for finding data sets that can be useful in Natural Language Processing.

The [ChatGPT sentiment analysis](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/charunisa/chatgpt-sentiment-analysis) data set contains Tweets about ChatGPT, coded by a sentiment analysis.

How does ChatGPT fare in these Tweets?
